Click here to start RadaR.
Click now to start.
This is also where you need confirm all changes in the selection sidebar.

You start automatically in the PATIENTS panel.
Check the other panels to look into antimicrobials consumption
Choose from 17 different selection criteria to refine you selection.
Some graphs are interactive. Use the moose to hover or zoom. Reset settings in the upper right.
Always look out for the option buttons under graphs and tables. Most of RadaR's functionality is here!
That's it. Enjoy useing RadaR and don't hesitate if you have suggestions or comments. You're feedback is very much appreciated!
